name: Stock Analysis with Markov Chains
tagline: Using Markov Chains and Monte Carlo Simulation to predict and analyze movement along Random Walks
body:
# Download it right away [**here**](https://github.com/d-soni/Markov-Stock-Analysis/raw/master/markovstock.jar)!
#### Source is available [**here**](https://github.com/d-soni/Markov-Stock-Analysis), along with dependencies.  
___

# Usage:  

To open the .jar file, you should be able to **double-click** it to open, assuming you have Java installed and configured. If this does not work, try the following in the command line:
````
java -jar markovstock.jar
````  

___
